Package com.kintone.client

Class AppClient

  • Object
    • AppClient
  • public class AppClient
extends Object
    A client that operates app APIs.

    • Method Detail

      • addApp

        public long addApp​(String name)
        Creates a preview App. The Deploy App Settings API must be used on the created preview App for the App to become live.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of App
        Returns:
        the App ID of the created preview App

      • addApp

        public long addApp​(String name,
                   Long spaceId,
                   Long threadId)
        Creates a preview App. The Deploy App Settings API must be used on the created preview App for the App to become live.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of App
        spaceId - the Space ID of where the App will be created
        threadId - the Thread ID of the thread in the Space where the App will be created
        Returns:
        the App ID of the created preview App

      • addApp

        public AddAppResponseBody addApp​(AddAppRequest request)
        Creates a preview App. The Deploy App Settings API must be used on the created preview App for the App to become live.
        Parameters:
        request - the request parameters. See AddAppRequest
        Returns:
        the response data. See AddAppResponseBody

      • addFormFields

        public long addFormFields​(long app,
                          List<FieldProperty> properties)
        Adds fields to a form of an App. This API updates the pre-live settings. After using this API, use the Deploy App Settings API to deploy the settings to the live App.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        properties - A list of field settings to added
        Returns:
        the revision number of the App settings

      • addFormFields

        public long addFormFields​(long app,
                          List<FieldProperty> properties,
                          Long revision)
        Adds fields to a form of an App. This API updates the pre-live settings. After using this API, use the Deploy App Settings API to deploy the settings to the live App.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        properties - A list of field settings to added
        revision - the expected revision number of the App settings
        Returns:
        the revision number of the App settings

      • addFormFields

        public long addFormFields​(long app,
                          Map<String,​FieldProperty> properties)
        Adds fields to a form of an App. This API updates the pre-live settings. After using this API, use the Deploy App Settings API to deploy the settings to the live App.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        properties - an object with data of the field settings
        Returns:
        the revision number of the App settings

      • addFormFields

        public long addFormFields​(long app,
                          Map<String,​FieldProperty> properties,
                          Long revision)
        Adds fields to a form of an App. This API updates the pre-live settings. After using this API, use the Deploy App Settings API to deploy the settings to the live App.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        properties - an object with data of the field settings
        revision - the expected revision number of the App settings
        Returns:
        the revision number of the App settings

      • addFormFields

        public AddFormFieldsResponseBody addFormFields​(AddFormFieldsRequest request)
        Adds fields to a form of an App. This API updates the pre-live settings. After using this API, use the Deploy App Settings API to deploy the settings to the live App.
        Parameters:
        request - the request parameters. See AddFormFieldsRequest
        Returns:
        the response data. See AddFormFieldsResponseBody

      • deleteFormFields

        public long deleteFormFields​(long app,
                             List<String> fields)
        Deletes fields from a form of an App. This API updates the pre-live settings. After using this API, use the Deploy App Settings API to deploy the settings to the live App.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        fields - the list of field codes of the fields to delete
        Returns:
        the revision number of the App settings

      • deleteFormFields

        public long deleteFormFields​(long app,
                             List<String> fields,
                             Long revision)
        Deletes fields from a form of an App. This API updates the pre-live settings. After using this API, use the Deploy App Settings API to deploy the settings to the live App.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        fields - the list of field codes of the fields to delete
        revision - the expected revision number of the App settings
        Returns:
        the revision number of the App settings

      • deleteFormFields

        public DeleteFormFieldsResponseBody deleteFormFields​(DeleteFormFieldsRequest request)
        Deletes fields from a form of an App. This API updates the pre-live settings. After using this API, use the Deploy App Settings API to deploy the settings to the live App.
        Parameters:
        request - the request parameters. See DeleteFormFieldsRequest
        Returns:
        the response data. See DeleteFormFieldsResponseBody

      • deployApp

        public void deployApp​(long app)
        Updates the settings of a pre-live App to the live App. Using this API is the same as clicking on "Update App" in the Kintone App's settings. Changes made to pre-live settings will not be deployed to the live app until this API is used.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID

      • deployApp

        public void deployApp​(long app,
                      Long revision)
        Updates the settings of a pre-live App to the live App. Using this API is the same as clicking on "Update App" in the Kintone App's settings. Changes made to pre-live settings will not be deployed to the live app until this API is used.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        revision - the expected revision number of the App settings

      • deployApp

        public DeployAppResponseBody deployApp​(DeployAppRequest request)
        Updates the settings of a pre-live App to the live App. Using this API is the same as clicking on "Update App" in the Kintone App's settings. Changes made to pre-live settings will not be deployed to the live app until this API is used.
        Parameters:
        request - the request parameters. See DeployAppRequest
        Returns:
        the response data. See DeployAppResponseBody

                                              long recordId)
        Evaluates the API user's permissions for records and fields within an App.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        recordId - the record ID
        Returns:
        the record permission object

                                                    List<Long> recordIds)
        Evaluates the API user's permissions for records and fields within an App.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        recordIds - the list of record IDs
        Returns:
        a list of objects that contain permissions of the specified records

      • getAppAcl

        public List<AppRightEntity> getAppAcl​(long app)
        Gets the App permissions of an app.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        Returns:
        a list of objects that contain data of App permission settings, in order of priority.

      • getAppAcl

        public GetAppAclResponseBody getAppAcl​(GetAppAclRequest request)

        Returns:

      • getAppAclPreview

        public List<AppRightEntity> getAppAclPreview​(long app)
        Gets the App permissions of an app. This API retrieves the pre-live settings that have not yet been deployed to the live App.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        Returns:
        a list of objects that contain data of App permission settings, in order of priority.

      • revertApp

        public void revertApp​(long app)
        Cancel all changes made to the pre-live settings. The pre-live settings will be reverted back to the current settings of the live app.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID

      • revertApp

        public void revertApp​(long app,
                      Long revision)
        Cancel all changes made to the pre-live settings. The pre-live settings will be reverted back to the current settings of the live app.
        Parameters:
        app - the App ID
        revision - the expected revision number of the App settings
